DOC.brief_title: The SORT OUT IX STEMI OCT Trial
DOC.detailed_description: SORT OUT IX STEMI OCT randomize 1:1 study compare polymer-free Biolimus-eluting BIOFREEDOM stent biodegradable-polymer Sirolimus-eluting ORSIRO stent patient STEMI treat primary PCI . Vascular heal index ( uncovered stent strut , malapposed stent strut , maximal intima coverage accumulate extra-stent lumen volume ) assess optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) 1 month primary PCI . Patients enrol investigator randomly allocate treatment group diagnostic coronary angiography primary PCI . A web base Trial Partner randomization system use . OCT perform frequency-domain OPTIS OCT system Dragonflyâ„¢ Imaging Catheter index procedure 1 month .
